mapper.select: SELECT TABLEID,DEID,COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE,ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL,BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP,COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT,BGTLVL,ISHREF,HREFLOC,HREFPARMID,OPENWINDOWTYPE,(SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME,PARENTNODECANCHECK FROM dict_t_factor

SELECT TABLEID,DEID,COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE,ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL, BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP,COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT,BGTLVL,ISHREF,HREFLOC,HREFPARMID,OPENWINDOWTYPE,(SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME,PARENTNODECANCHECK,XLSXCOLUMNID FROM dict_t_factor
COLUMNID = #{columnid}

SELECT TABLEID,DEID,COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE,ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL, BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP,COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT,BGTLVL,ISHREF,HREFLOC,HREFPARMID ,OPENWINDOWTYPE,(SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME,PARENTNODECANCHECK FROM dict_t_factor
TABLEID=#{tableid} and DBCOLUMNNAME in (select DBCOLUMNNAME from dict_t_defaultcol where status = '1' AND dealID =( select DEALTYPE from dict_t_model where tableid=#{tableid}) and ISPRIMARY = '1')

SELECT TABLEID,DEID,COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE,ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL, BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP,COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT,BGTLVL,ISHREF,HREFLOC,HREFPARMID ,OPENWINDOWTYPE,(SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME,PARENTNODECANCHECK FROM dict_t_factor
DBCOLUMNNAME = #{dbcolumnname}

select t.frmtabid from P#dict_t_factor t
t.tableid = #{tableid} group by t.frmtabid

SELECT TABLEID,DEID,COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE,ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL,BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP,COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT,BGTLVL,ISHREF,HREFLOC,HREFPARMID ,OPENWINDOWTYPE,(SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME,PARENTNODECANCHECK FROM P#dict_t_factor u WHERE u.TABLEID=#{tableid} AND STATUS='1' AND ISLEAF=#{isleaf} AND Year=Global_MultYear_CZ.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') AND u.DBCOLUMNNAME NOT IN(select t.DBCOLUMNNAME from dict_t_factor t where t.TABLEID=#{tableid} AND t.ISLEAF='1') ORDER BY u.DBVERSION ASC

SELECT TABLEID, DEID, COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE, ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL, BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP, COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT, BGTLVL, ISHREF, HREFLOC, HREFPARMID, OPENWINDOWTYPE, (SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME, PARENTNODECANCHECK FROM P#dict_t_factor u WHERE u.TABLEID = #{tableid} AND STATUS = '1' AND u.dbcolumnname is not null and not exists (select 1 from user_tab_cols a where a.COLUMN_NAME = u.dbcolumnname and table_name = upper('${dbtablename}')) order by u.dbversion asc

WITH SUIT AS ( SELECT suitid columnid, suitname name, superid tableid, '' dbcolumnname, '1' nocheck, '1' open, orderid, '0' nodetype, '0' isleaf FROM Dict_t_Suit WHERE appid = #{appID} ORDER BY orderid ), DICTMODEL AS ( SELECT tableid columnid, name, suitid tableid, dbtablename dbcolumnname, '0' nocheck, '0' open, orderid, '1' nodetype, '0' isleaf FROM dict_t_model WHERE suitid IN (SELECT columnid FROM SUIT) AND TABLETYPE = '1' ORDER BY orderid )
SELECT * FROM SUIT UNION ALL SELECT * FROM DICTMODEL UNION ALL SELECT columnid columnid, name, tableid, dbcolumnname, '0' nocheck, '0' open, orderid, '3' nodetype, '1' isleaf FROM Dict_t_Factor WHERE tableid IN (SELECT columnid FROM DICTMODEL) AND isleaf = '1'

with appreg as (select appid as columnid, appname as name, '' as tableid, '0' as superid, '' as dbcolumnname, '1' as nocheck, '1' as open, orderid, '0' as nodetype, '0' as isleaf, 0 as levelno from dict_t_appregister order by orderid), suit as (select suitid as columnid, suitname as name, '' as tableid, (case superid when '0' then appid else superid end) as superid, '' as dbcolumnname, '1' as nocheck, '1' as open, orderid, '0' as nodetype, '0' as isleaf, 0 as levelno from Dict_t_Suit where appid in (select columnid from appreg) order by orderid), dictmodel as (select tableid as columnid, name, tableid, SUITID as superid, dbtablename as dbcolumnname, '0' as nocheck, '0' as open, orderid, '1' as nodetype, '0' as isleaf, 0 as levelno from dict_t_model where suitid in (select columnid from suit) order by orderid)
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM APPREG UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SUIT UNION ALL SELECT * FROM DICTMODEL UNION ALL SELECT columnid as columnid, name, tableid, (case superid when '0' then tableid else superid end) as superid, dbcolumnname, (case isleaf when '1' then '0' else '1' end) as nocheck, '0' as open, orderid, '3' as nodetype, isleaf, levelno FROM DICT_T_FACTOR WHERE TABLEID IN (SELECT COLUMNID FROM DICTMODEL) ) ORDER BY ORDERID, COLUMNID

SELECT TABLEID,DEID,COLUMNID, NAME, DBCOLUMNNAME, DATATYPE, DATALENGTH, SCALE, NULLABLE, DEFAULTVALUE, CSID, ISUPDATE, ORDERID, SUPERID, ISLEAF, LEVELNO, ALIAS, COLFORMAT, SHOWFORMAT, SHOWWIDTH, ISKEY, ISVISIBLE, ISRESERVE,ISSUM, ISREGEX, REGEXPR, REGEXPRINFO, ISBANDCOL,BANDCOLUMNID, BANDREFDWCOL, EXTPROP,COLTIPS, FRMTABID, FRMCOLID, ISVIRTUAL, VIRCONTEXT,BGTLVL,ISHREF,HREFLOC,HREFPARMID ,OPENWINDOWTYPE,(SELECT DBTABLENAME FROM dict_t_modelcode WHERE TABLEID = CSID) as CSDBTABLENAME,PARENTNODECANCHECK FROM dict_t_factor u WHERE TABLEID = #{tableID} AND ISLEAF = '1'
SELECT TYPEID, RESERVE_1 FROM DICT_T_PUBLIC WHERE KEYID = '0008'
SELECT RESERVE_1 FROM DICT_T_PUBLIC WHERE KEYID = '0013' AND TYPEID = 'EDITMODE'
SELECT t.COLUMN_NAME FROM all_tab_columns t WHERE t.TABLE_NAME=#{table_bak_name}
